bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with han 寒① , cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 14: 因乘風取涼，冷氣卒傷 於肺，即發成嗽 , “Because [this person] was intruded by wind and adopted a state of coolness, the cold qi caused sudden harm to the lung. This in turn generated cough”.
② Pathological Condition identical with han 寒 , cold

②. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 短氣，心胸滿，心下堅，冷 氣也，此疾有十許方， “[When a person experiences] shortness of qi/breath, fullness of the heart and chest, as well as hardenings below his heart, this is [a condition of] cold qi . For this ailment there are more than ten recipes”.
